resources:
Hope //Headings Check Eligibility Schedule Appointment Post a Blood Donation Request //Description Take a quick self assessment test to know if you are fit enough to donate blood by answering a few simple questions. Schedule blood donation by picking available date and time slots according to your preference. Request for blood to thousands of users from the University in a few quick simple steps.
Select your blood group
A+
A-
B+
B-
AB+
AB-
O+
O-
